name: Trials for Reincarnation
description:
Trials for Reincarnation, a top-down action shooter in which you have to kill all of the enemies in the area in order to proceed. This is a great game for players who likes playing hack n slash and very difficult games in horde mode environment. 

This Game is created by 5 Undergraduate College students in FEU Alabang, this game is still in work in progress due to rush release because it is required to be released early. This game was developed only for one a half month so don't expect it to be a good game.

For more info you can check out our discord.

https://discord.gg/FaEqAht5sj
